title: Kick to kick [Widescreen]
creator_credit: AFTRS, Fiona Tuomy and Tony McNamara
brief_description: An hilarious short Australian film in which Derek and Kay teach their son Hec “how to use his body” and the finer points of Australian Rules football in a backyard game of Kick-to-Kick. A must-see for football supporters of all ages. Starring Richard Healy, Caz Lederman and Matt Long.
